content: this text is about a legal case where one party is owed 111834 euros and is seeking to recover this amount from another party the case involves the division of property between a husband and wife referred to as mp and ep the husband has agreed to buy 50 ownership of a property owned by his wife for €85000 the process of mediation began on february 9 2015 after an application was filed on september 26 2014 the first meeting was scheduled for october 23 2014 but was postponed multiple times due to various reasons the parties have now reached an agreement through mediation which involves the payment of mediation costs and the regularizing of accounting issues the agreement has been signed by the parties and their lawyers and is considered legally enforceable the mediation process is now closed and the parties have reached a conciliation
